description: Join Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser as they lift the veil and showcase the hauntings, urban myths, unsolved murders and general oddities that everyone has experienced but no one wants to talk about.
title: Bizarre States

episodes.title: It's Raining Cats and Frogs
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser round up the weirdest news of the week, including ghost islands, a mysterious whale corpse found in a jungle, and decapitated mummies. Then they dive into the history of real instances where animals fell from the sky.

episodes.title: 2019: The Year of the Grenade
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser go into the weirdest news of the week, including turning yourself into a statue, abandoned sharks, and what happens when a man named Bud Weisser trespasses at a brewery with a similar name. Also they try to break down why so many people have been finding really old grenades recently.

episodes.title: Bizarre States with Special Guest Nicholas McCarthy!
episodes.description: Horror fans rejoice! This week is an all-horror episode where Andrew Bowser is joined by Nicholas McCarthy, the director of Orion Pictures' _The Prodigy_. They talk horror movie shop, getting into influences, paranormal experiences, and how to construct a good scare in _The Prodigy._ Also, Bowser is joined by actress Sarah Hay, who recounts a haunting that occurred during the filming of her film _Braid._

episodes.title: Bizarre States with Special Guest Roz Drezfalez!
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot is joined by comedian Roz Drezfalez, host of the "Ghosted! with Roz Drezfalez" podcast. The pair chat about Roz's history with the paranormal, ouija boards, Los Angeles hauntings, and Amelia Earhart. Oh, and they call that the Weird of the Week trend for 2019 will be people finding old grenades hidden in places they shouldn't be.

episodes.title: The One About Grenades, Vanilla Extract, and Taco Bell
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser dive into the weirdest news of the week along with some spooky stuff! Bowser dives deep into his Hot Ted Bundy conspiracy theory. And what do Florida, grenades, and delicious tacos have in common? You'll have to listen to find out.

episodes.title: Jeremy Corbell talks Bob Lazar and Area 51
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot is joined by longtime friend of the show Jeremy Corbell to talk about his documentary "Bob Lazar: Area 51 & Flying Saucers" which dives deep into the life of the man who brought Area 51 into common knowledge.

episodes.title: Bowser’s Backyard Mega-Update and more!
episodes.description: This week hosts Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser recount a harrowing tale from Bowser's Backyard. Also Jess gives an update on her haunted mirror, Bigfoot sightings, and friendly Satan.

episodes.title: 3 Million Dollar Tuna, More Fatbergs, and Doorbell Lickers
episodes.description: Andrew Bowser is joined by Nerdist producer Erin Vail to talk the weirdest news of the week -- including doorbell-licking prowlers, giant tuna auctions, and sewer-stopping grease plugs. And they also get into the darker side of pop culture.

episodes.title: New Year's Listener Stories
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser ring in the New Year right with some listener stories to instill the correct mood for 2019.

episodes.title: Bizarre 2018 in Review
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser talk their favorite 2018 moments and give some updates to stories that they covered through the year. Also they discuss what words they really think are weird.

episodes.title: Red Dead Bizarros
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser talk about the weird, creepy, and bizarre sightings in Red Dead Redemption 2. Also McDonalds and Taco Bell Holiday merch.

episodes.title: Spooky Japan
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser talk about spooky ghost stories from Japan. They also talk middle finger lawn statues and thieving nuns.

episodes.title: Bizarre Christmas Traditions, Corpse Smugglers, and More!
episodes.description: Hosts Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser probe the mysteries of the weird, supernatural and occult, dragging into the light current and historical paranormal activities and personal experiences, plus guest stories and expert opinion.

episodes.title: The Mysterious Disappearance of Glenn Miller, Listener Stories, and More!
episodes.description: Hosts Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser probe the mysteries of the weird, supernatural and occult, dragging into the light current and historical paranormal activities and personal experiences, plus guest stories and expert opinion.

episodes.title: Classic: The Traveling Museum with Greg Newkirk and Dana Matthews
episodes.description:
Jessica and Bowser are joined by Greg Newkirk and Dana Matthews of Weird HQ! Greg and Dana were kind enough to bring some artifacts from The Traveling Museum of The Paranormal and The Occult!

 

Originally aired 3/16/2017

episodes.title: Talking Horror with Special Guest Mallory O'Meara
episodes.description: Andrew Bowser is joined by filmmaker and author Mallory O'Meara of the Reading Glasses Podcast! They talk cat mummies, the state of modern horror, and Mallory's upcoming book 'The Lady from the Black Lagoon: Hollywood Monsters and the Lost Legacy of Milicent Patrick.'"

episodes.title: Listener Story Roundup
episodes.description: Hosts Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser probe the mysteries of the weird, supernatural and occult, dragging into the light current and historical paranormal activities and personal experiences, plus guest stories and expert opinion.

episodes.title: Fallout 76 Exclusives, Sin Eaters, and More!
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser probe the mysteries of the weird, supernatural and occult, dragging into the light, current and historical paranormal activities and personal experiences, plus guest stories and expert opinion.

episodes.title: Fallout 76 Exclusives, Historical Geyser Junk, & More!
episodes.description: Hosts Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser probe the mysteries of the weird, supernatural and occult, dragging into the light current and historical paranormal activities and personal experiences, plus guest stories and expert opinion.

episodes.title: Weird Locations For Sale (Salem House, Island Fortress, etc) and More!
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser cover cookies that might contain human remains, Coven Corner witch story breakdown, Bowser's trip to Salem, and a rundown of weird locations for sale.

episodes.title: DECLASSIFIED: Conversations with a Ceremonial Magick Practitioner
episodes.description: Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser speak with Dr. Vere Chappell, a ceremonial magick practitioner.

episodes.title: Play Doh Makes Poo Doh, Entire Vineyard Stolen, & More!
DECLASSIFIED: Conversations with UFO Researchers
episodes.description: Whitley Strieber and Steve Neill, world-renowned UFO researchers, join hosts Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser to share their documented close encounters of the Third Kind.

episodes.title: DECLASSIFIED: Conversations with an Exorcist
episodes.description: Rachel Stavis, possibly the world's only non-denominational exorcist, talks with Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser about becoming an exorcist, the differences of being a non-denominational exorcist, and working with higher beings.

episodes.title: Small Town Dicks with Yeardley Smith
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by a special guest, Yeardley Smith! They talk bloody eyed selfies, an ancient bronze hand, and Yeardley's podcast Small Town Dicks!

episodes.title: DECLASSIFIED: Conversations with an Astrologer
episodes.description:
Christy C, a practicing Western Astrologer, writer, and teacher who specializes in birth chart consultations, joins Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser to explore their birth charts and astrological signs.

Be sure to check out new episodes of Bizarre States: Declassified starting September 26th only on Alpha!

episodes.title: You're Not Broken
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are back to talk about a prison necklace, more sex doll brothels, and a deeper dive into Post Malone's curse!

episodes.title: DECLASSIFIED: Conversations with The Mystic Museum Curators
episodes.description:
Kiko Bailey and Erick Wessel, curators and owners of The Mystic Musem, explore their collection of spirit boards, oddities, and haunted items in the museum and store.

Be sure to check out new episodes of Bizarre States: Declassified starting September 26th only on Alpha!

episodes.title: Hunt For The Skinwalker with Jeremy Corbell
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser welcome back good friend of the show, Jeremy Corbell! They talk about Post Malone's recent brushes with death, dynamite mistaken for a candle, an incident with a dog sitter, and Jeremy's new movie Hunt For The Skinwalker out on VOD now!

episodes.title: DECLASSIFIED: Conversations with a Witch
episodes.description:
Dylan Bauer, also known as Mystic Dylan, delves into the history, lore, and ancient texts of mysticism and magic with Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser.

Be sure to check out new episodes of Bizarre States: Declassified starting September 26th only on Alpha!

episodes.title: SICK BEATS
episodes.description: Bowser and a sick Chobot are back this week to talk about microwave weapons, stolen insects, the found ruby slippers from The Wizard of Oz, and listener stories!

episodes.title: DECLASSIFIED: Conversations with a Bigfoot Expert
episodes.description:
Matt Moneymaker, the foremost Bigfoot expert and head of the Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization, explores the history, lore, and firsthand accounts of the elusive Bigfoot with Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser.

Be sure to check out new episodes of Bizarre States: Declassified starting September 26th only on Alpha!

episodes.title: Sex & Cinnamon Rolls
episodes.description: This week Bowser and Jess (AKA Detective Cinnamon Roll) discuss a sex-doll brothel, a new way to quit your job, and listener stories!

episodes.title: The Handmaid's Ghost
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess discuss a biscuit assault, an update on the Loch Ness monster, and city's claiming Bigfoot as their own. They also dive into the haunting of The Handmaid's Tale costume department. Also Milli Vanilli.

episodes.title: ALL WEIRD OF THE WEEK
episodes.description: This episode is ALL Weird of The Week! Coke nuns, lunch lady thieves, and drunk wasps! Has the D.B. Cooper mystery been solved? Why are lullabies always so dark? All this and more!

episodes.title: BONUS Live from Midsummer Scream 2018!
episodes.description: Live from Midsummer Scream in Long Beach, CA! Bowser and Jess discuss the sad story of Floyd Collins.

episodes.title: TEACHERS OR ART THIEVES?
episodes.description: This week Bowser and Jess discuss Joe Hill and the Jaws mystery, ghost babies, and a stolen painting worth $165M that was found in the home of 2 school teachers after they passed.

episodes.title: BONUS Live from SDCC 2018 with Michael McMillian
episodes.description: Live from San Diego Comic-Con 2018, Jess and Bowser talk to Michael McMillian (True Blood, Crazy Ex-Girlfriend) about his podcast Bigfoot Collectors Club and more!

episodes.title: Can't Please Anybody
episodes.description: This week Bowser and Jess read your listener mail as well as some Weird of the Week!

episodes.title: Burrito Baby
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are back from SDCC! They take it easy for the 200th episode and talk cat poo, chick-fil-a baby, and listener emails!

episodes.title: MAD POOPER STRIKES CLOSE TO HOME
episodes.description: Jess is back to talk about SDCC plans, a mad pooper, and more!

episodes.title: The Whaley House with Annelie Tomasic
episodes.description: Chobot is away so Bowser is joined by Aristotle for some Weird of the Week! Then Annelie Tomasic from the LDN offices jumps in to tell us some of her paranormal experiences!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: A Load of Chaz
episodes.description:
This week Bowser and Jess are joined by Nerdist coworker Jason Nguyen to tell us a strange tale about his friend Chaz!

Originally aired: 7/7/2016

episodes.title: Occult LA with Molly Lambert
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by Molly Lambert, host of Night Call, to talk about some spooky LA and Weird of the Week!

episodes.title: 5 Hours of Drinking and a Threesome
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess recount their trip to The Stanley Hotel, Weird of the Week, and read some listener mail!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Erika Lewis
episodes.description:
Erika Lewis (author of The 49th Key) talks with Bizarre States about creepy mythology.

Originally aired 4/16/2015

episodes.title: EVIL GENIUS with Trey Borzillieri & Barbara Schroeder
episodes.description: Bower and Jess are joined by the filmmakers behind Netflix's Evil Genius, Trey Borzillieri and Barbara Schroeder! SPOILERS!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Annamarie Tendler Mulaney
episodes.description:
Two great tastes that taste great together? Make-up and Hauntings. Annamarie Tendler Mulaney talks about her new Smart Girls show The Other Side.

Originally aired 3/28/2016

episodes.title: Es & Cheese with Gaby Dunn
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined this week by Gaby Dunn (Bad with Money podcast) to talk some Weird of The Week and Gaby's experience in Gettysburg!

episodes.title: Its All Garbage
episodes.description: Its an all news episode today! So much Weird of The Week and Poo Corner (TURD WARNING!) LETS GET INTO IT!

episodes.title: Hobby Lobby Raiders!
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess talk Hobby Lobby and Wild Wild Country!

episodes.title: Cult of Chobot
episodes.description: This week Bowser and Jess talk killers and cults!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: SKD & Urban Legends
episodes.description:
Chobot & Bowser chat about the first successful penis transplant (because why wouldn't we), Bloody Mary and read listener mail!

Originally aired 3/9/2015

episodes.title: CHOBOT IS BACK
episodes.description: This week Bowser is joined by...JESSICA CHOBOT! Chobot is back with some Weird of the Week and Poo Corner!

episodes.title: #WheresChobot with Greg Sestero
episodes.description: Bowser is joined by the great Greg Sestero to talk about some weird of the week, Greg's new film Best F(r)iends, and his personal paranormal experiences!

episodes.title: The Bowel-ser Show with Bonnie Gordon!
episodes.description: Bowser is joined by good friend Bonnie Gordon! They get into some dark Weird of The Week and talk about Bonnie's paranormal upbringing!

episodes.title: Murder Chose Me with Detective Rod Demery
episodes.description: This week, Bowser is joined by Detective Rod Demery of Investigation Discovery's series "Murder Chose Me"!

episodes.title: The 4 Humors
episodes.description: This week on JESS-WATCH, still no Jess! So Bowser invites on Aristotle to talk about bugs, the 4 humors, and to read some listener stories!

episodes.description:
No Jess this week so Bowser is joined by Bizarre States: Los Angeles producer, Derrick Paller! After Derrick, Bowser is joined by Teno Stark!

Be sure to check out Bizarre States panel March 24th at WonderCon!

episodes.title: Games and Gushers
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser talk Gushers, guano, and BOWSER'S BACKYARD on today's Bizarre States!

episodes.description: On a special ALL Poo-Corner episode, Jess and Bowser are joined by The Sklar Brothers to talk about Poop Talk!

episodes.title: Practical Magick with Olivia Taylor Dudley
episodes.description: No Jess today so Bowser called in a very special guest, Olivia Taylor Dudley!

episodes.title: Valentine's and Demons!
episodes.description: Bowser is away so Jess is joined by Aristotle and a SPECIAL GUEST! Stephen (AKA Stovetop!) joins Jess and Aristotle to talk about his quest to summon a demon and the history of Valentine's Day!

episodes.title: Deep Dive Dark Disney
episodes.description: This week, Bowser and Jess take deep dive into the dark corners of Disney's history!

episodes.title: The Monkey with Chad Lindberg
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by Chad Lindberg to talk about his new show Chad Lindberg's BADASS Celebrity Ghost Hunt and his encounter with a monkey sent by the universe!

episodes.title: Chickens and Listener Stories!
episodes.description: This week, Jess is joined by Aristotle to read some listener stories and talk about CHICKENS!

episodes.title: DECLASSIFIED with Jeremy Kenyon Lockyer Corbell
episodes.description: Jess is back this week to chat with Bowser and returning guest Jeremy Kenyon Lockyer Corbell about the recently declassified UFO videos and how it connects to Skinwalker Ranch!

episodes.title: Haunted eBay!
episodes.description: While Jess is away, Bowser invites Aristotle on the show to talk poo and dolls!

episodes.title: New Year, New Bizarre!
episodes.description: Its the first episode of 2018! Jess and Bowser discuss Guillermo Del Toro's UFO experience, the Space X launch, and more!

episodes.title: Goodbye 2017 with Jonny Loquasto!
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are closing out the year with one of our favorite guests, Jonny Loquasto! They talk some weird of the week and listen to some EVPs. See you in 2018 Bizarros!

episodes.title: Listener Stories and Happy Holidays!
episodes.description: On this Holiday episode, Bowser and Jess read listener stories!

episodes.title: Upside-down Christmas Trees
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess read listener stories and Jess tells us why she hates upside-down Christmas trees!

episodes.title: Mystery Moose with Rhys Darby
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by the incredible Rhys Darby to talk about their favorite cryptids, personal experiences, and the note found in a statues butt!

episodes.title: Patient Seventeen with Jeremy Kenyon Lockyer Corbell
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by a returning guest from the early days of the podcast, Jeremy Kenyon Lockyer Corbell!

episodes.title: Cats are fun, Manson is not
episodes.description: Jess is back from Japan! After catching up, Bowser and Jess dive into Charles Manson.

episodes.title: The Haunted Grocery Store
episodes.description: While Jess is still away, Bowser invited Aristotle to co-host today's episode!

episodes.title: Ghost Carrot with Kristian Bruun
episodes.description: While Jess is away, Bowser calls upon Kristian Bruun to fill in!

episodes.title: Happy Dab
episodes.description: This week, Jess and Bowser recap Bizarre States: Los Angeles with a clips and a guest call-in!

episodes.description:
Bowser and Jess dive into the history of The Winchester Mystery House!

You can buy Chris Raimo's book Spooky Things here!

episodes.title: Haunted by History with Craig Owens
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are joined by Craig Owens to talk about his book Haunted by History!

episodes.title: Listener Stories!
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess have more updates on the submarine murder-mystery, a new Bizarre States pin, and LISTENER STORIES!

episodes.title: Pickled States!
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser gives us an update on that submarine murder mystery, a cough that leads to discovering a swallowed toy, and some pickled godwincedence!

episodes.title: The Pooniverse
episodes.description:
This week, Jessica and Bowser expand Poo Corner into a POO-UNIVERSE! They then take a bit of a dark turn for today's main story...  And then listener stories!

Be sure to check out Bizarre States Los Angeles on Alpha!

episodes.title: The Magician's Way with Randy Pitchford
episodes.description: Jessica is joined by Randy Pitchford of Gearbox Software to talk about his life as a magician!

episodes.title: Fatberg Right Ahead!
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess discuss the fatberg discovered under London, the runaway tick, and a new segment "Today in Bizarre History"!

episodes.title: The Zen Poop
episodes.description: This week Bowser and Jess discuss the "cough syrup" murder, an update on the submarine murder mystery, and another great poop corner!

episodes.title: LIVE from SDCC 2017
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are coming to you live from San Diego Comic-Con 2017!

episodes.title: Benches & Swings
episodes.description: This week, Bowser tells a very NSFW story, Jess talks about damages to art and artifacts, and the main story is about a submarine murder mystery!

episodes.title: The Hippo Meat That Almost Was
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are back to give some weirdos the week and to talk about the history of 2 extremely interesting men that almost brought us hippo meat!

episodes.title: The Chateau Marmont with Derek Miller
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by Derek Miller of The Nerdist School! They discuss black mayonnaise, sea lice, and Derek's time at the chateau marmont!

episodes.title: Who is the REAL Angelyne
episodes.description: Jessica and Bowser this week talk about the Outback Steakhouse cult, NextDoor, and the revealed identity of Angelyne the Billboard Queen!

episodes.title: The Dirty Butt-Hair Story
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are back from SDCC to give us one of the greatest poo corners in Bizarre history. Then, harsh reality comes crashing back down when they get into the main story...beware.

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Unacknowledged with Dr. Steven Greer
episodes.description:
Bowser and Jess are joined by a very special guest, Dr. Steven Greer. They talk about Dr. Greer's book/documentary Unacknowledged, Weird of The Week and a listener story!

Originally aired 5/18/2017

episodes.title: Gerry Duggan Explains This Simulation!
episodes.description: This week Bizarre States is in full force with Bowser AND Jess! They're joined by Gerry Duggan to talk about why we might be living in a simulation!

episodes.title: 3 Years of Bizarre!
episodes.description: This week we celebrate 3 years of Bizarre States!

episodes.title: Slashed! with Clarke Wolfe
episodes.description:
While Jess is away, Bowser is joined by a special returning guest/host Clarke Wolfe!

Check out Slashed: The Musical on Facebook!

episodes.title: Saint Brains in a Tea Pot, Why Not? With Special Guest Baby-Face Bowser
episodes.description: Jess and special guest host Baby-Face Bowser chat about the hidden Nazi artifacts found in Argentina, stolen saint brains in tea pots, the story of the arborist who gets revenge on a mayor a nd they read some listener stories about ghosts!

episodes.title: Pee Bucket with Nerdist Staff!
episodes.description: Jess is away at E3 so this week Bowser is joined by Aristotle for weird of the week! And then as a special treat, we get to hear stories from Stephen, TL, B-Comp, Sax and Marhyan from around the Legendary Digital offices!

episodes.title: Bees in the Trap!
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser talk this week about their first on-location shoot, vaginal wasp nests,  and the story of how Troy was discovered!

episodes.title: LISTENER STORIES!
episodes.description: Today's episode is all Listner Stories! There's also some Weird of The Week sprinkled in and 2 big announcements from Bowser and Jess!

episodes.title: The Foul Smell at AnalTech
episodes.description: No Bowser this week so Jess is joined by a special guest you're very familiar with...Aristotle! They talk about a haunted tower in London, listener stories and answer questions from chat!

episodes.title: Unacknowledged with Dr. Steven Greer
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by a very special guest, Dr. Steven Greer. They talk about Dr. Greer's book/documentary Unacknowledged, Weird of The Week and a listener story!

episodes.title: Habitual Masticater
episodes.description:
Jess and Bowser are back for a “hostful” to talk about the Zillow nightmare house, the human eating deer and questions from chat!

WARNING: S-TOWN SPOILERS!

episodes.title: Spontaneous Human Combustion
episodes.description: Its just Jess and Bowser this week to talk flushing ashes in baseball stadiums, female dragonflies faking their death and spontaneous combustion!

episodes.title: The Lady Companion with Tricia Carr
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined this week by Tricia Carr! They talk Harry Styles, semen smuggling and Tricia’s work as an animal communicator!

episodes.title: Shat in The Hat
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are back for a traditional episode with just the 2 of them! They talk about beercycling, Government psychic experiments and if smelling farts is good for your health.

episodes.title: #LetBowserPoop with Erika Lewis
episodes.description: This week Jess and Bowser are joined by returning guest and friend of the show, Erika Lewis! They talk about her new book Game of Shadows, her love of Ireland, and Poop Corner!

episodes.title: The Watcher Returns with Chris Medina
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined this week by psychic Chris Medina! They talk about the return of the watcher, Chris does a reading of Bowser and Jess, and Jess reads the first email that the show got!

episodes.title: 5 Month Cult with Stephen Johnson
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by Stephen Johnson! They talk about your new pet fur watch, Bella Lugosi's mansion and the Synanon cult!

episodes.title: Ball Puns with The Ghost Brothers
episodes.description: No Jess this week but Bowser is joined by the Ghost Brothers! Dalen Spratt, Juwan Mass, and Marcus Harvey talk about a testicle festival, the Evil Within and the Ghost Brothers, Fridays at 10 PM on TLC!

episodes.title: The Traveling Museum with Greg Newkirk and Dana Matthews
episodes.description: Jessica and Bowser are joined by Greg Newkirk and Dana Matthews of Weird HQ! Greg and Dana were kind enough to bring some artifacts from The Traveling Museum of The Paranormal and The Occult!

episodes.title: Mysterious Case of The Hoverboard
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are back this week to talk about the woman who poisoned her husband to not have sex, the town of Dildo and Bowser comes clean about a hoverboard mystery!

episodes.title: Occultic Values with Olivia Taylor Dudley
episodes.description: Bowser is hosting solo again but is joined by Olivia Taylor Dudley! They discuss coffin clubs, body found at the Magic Castle and demon toys!

episodes.title: The Life and Times of Ted Raimi
episodes.description: Bowser is joined by special guest Ted Raimi to discuss some Weird of the Week, Ted's career and read a listener story!

episodes.title: Ye Who Smelt It with Karyn Kusama
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by special guest Karyn Kusama (The Invitation, XX)! They talk all about her films and the horror genre, another case of rectum smuggling, murder text and listener stories!

episodes.title: Beware The Slenderman!
episodes.description:
Jess and Bowser are back this week to talk about the gold butt smuggler, a long lost continent and Beware The Slenderman on HBO! 

Want more Bizarre States? You can watch Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser record their podcast episodes live Wednesdays at 4pm PST on Alpha and YouTube, or catch up on all the episodes you missed on Alpha.

episodes.title: Peter Von Puttkamer
episodes.description: Andrew and Jess are joined by a special guest, Peter Von Puttkamer! They talk about the slender man, sasquatch and Bowser has gifts!

episodes.title: Dongle Dangle with Alicia Lutes
episodes.description: Jessica is joined by Nerdist's very own Alicia Lutes! They talk about the dildo bandit, the man with the 19" penis, Japanties USA and ALIENS!

episodes.title: Can you s**t out of your mouth?
episodes.description:
Bowser and Jess are back this week with "Welcome to Poo Corner", weird Detroit stories, #japanty and Chobot's ghost town trip!

Note: There is a buzz in this episode

episodes.title: Friday The 13th with Brad Meltzer
episodes.description: To celebrate Friday The 13th, Jess and Bowser are joined by Brad Meltzer to talk about ALL THE CONSPIRACY THEORIES!

episodes.title: Farting Angels
episodes.description: No guest this week which means we get some awesome butt stories, ghost prince, the Chilean UFO and listener stories!

episodes.title: The Story of Polybius with Todd Luoto and Jon Frechette
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are kicking off 2017 with Todd Luoto and Jon Frechette! They start with preshow poop/swear stories, Charles Manson, Sinbad and the story of Polybius!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: NASA's Cover-up!
episodes.description:
Jess is back! Bowser talks about a truely depressing documentary and then Jess delves into the NASA Challeneger cover-up!

Originally aired 2/4/16

episodes.title: Dem Squatch boiZ (Mike Shaw and Michael Leffler)
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are joined by Dem Squatch boiZ, Mike Shaw and Michael Leffler. We get Squatch updates, a ghost love triangle, the black Dahlia house and listener stories!

episodes.title: Karen Rontowski Can Read!
episodes.description: Karen Rontowski joins Bowser and Jess to give them a tarot reading, talk about her paranormal experiences, monks mound and listener stories!

episodes.title: Good Chicken with Kyle Kinane & Dave Stone!
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are joined by the hosts of The Boogie Monster podcast, Kyle Kinane & Dave Stone! They have an update on Japan's pizza delivering reindeer, the bionic penis, magician wars and listener stories!

episodes.title: Kismet VR - Tarot & Automatons
episodes.description: Jess is back from her holiday get away and is joined by TWO special guests! Taking over for Bowser this episode is Nerdist Editor-in-Chief, Rachel Heine! Rachel adn Jess are also joined by David Chontos, director of Psyop VR, to play Kismet!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Jack The Ripper with Ptolemy Slocum
episodes.description:
Jessica and Bowser are away for Thanksgiving so we decided to run an old classic with Ptolemy Slocum who you can now see on HBO's Westworld! 

Special guest, Ptolemy Slocum, goes over the recent Jack the Ripper discovery with Bizarre States and shares some unnerving stories of the unknown.

Originally aired 9/11/14

episodes.title: The Rake with Jin Kelley
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by one of our favorites, Jin Kelley! They talk about a newly discovered ship graveyard, hop pot and the Rake!

episodes.title: Tiki Surf Witches!
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are back this week to talk about a mysterious noise in Alaska, an update on Robert Durst and Tiki Surf Witches!

episodes.title: The Led Zeppelin Curse with Brandon Winfrey
episodes.description:
Jess is Bowser-less this week so she’s joined by Brandon Winfrey. Brandon talks about his Ouija board experience which leads to Jess’ dive into the Led Zeppelin curse!

NOTE: There is a buzz for the first few minutes

episodes.title: Peas and Carrots: The Halloween Special
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser celebrate halloween with updates from the clown corner, Charlie The Choo Choo, the Bermuda Triangle and listener stories!

episodes.title: Bowser's Backyard Special
episodes.description:
This week's episode was recorded in Bowser's actual backyard! Jessica demonstrates how to make a sigil!

Subscribe to Nerdist on Twitch to catch Bizarre States live every Wednesday at 4!

episodes.title: Live from The LA Podcast Festival!
episodes.description: Its a special Live episode from the LA Podcast Pestival with Jonny Loquasto!

episodes.title: Natures Gross with Elizabeth De Razzo
episodes.description: Elizabeth De Razzo (The Greasy Strangler, Eastbound & Down) joins Jess and Bowser to talk abour her experience at The Stanley Hotel, clown update, the Winchester discovery and listener mail!

episodes.title: Atlas Obscura's Dylan Thuras
episodes.description: Bowser and Jessica are joined by a very special guest, Dylan Thuras! Dylan is a founder of Atlas Obscura and one of the writers of Atlas Obscura: An Explorer's Guide to the World's Hidden Wonders.

episodes.title: Mostly Murder with Josh Gates!
episodes.description:
Bowser and Jess are back with a special guest! Josh Gates of Expedition Unknown! They talk about the most recent clown news, mothman vs goatman and Josh's hunt for the Yeti!

Subscribe to Nerdist on Twitch to catch Bizarre States live every wednesday at 4!

episodes.title: Jonny Loquasto Returns!
episodes.description: Thats right! Jonny Loquasto is back on the show to talk about his trip to Iraq, Bowser talks about some hometown clowns and Jess gives some book recommendations!

episodes.title: Ouija Ouija Ouija
episodes.description: Bowser and ChoBLOOD are back to talk about a haunted ouija board, fecal vomiting, Jess' clown picture and Listener Stories!

episodes.title: The 100th Episode!
episodes.description:
ITS HERE! 100 episodes of Bizarre States! Join Bowser and Jess as they talk about a stolen ghost, a group of clowns and a mysterious package!

Subscribe to Nerdist on Twitch to catch Bizarre States live every Wednesday at 4!

episodes.title: Beware The Dogman with Jin Kelley
episodes.description:
Chobot is flying Bowser-less this week but is joined by special guest, Jin Kelley. They dive into the world of the Michigan Dogman!

Subscribe to Nerdist on Twitch to catch Bizarre States live every Wednesday at 4!

episodes.title: Juicing Out
episodes.description:
A strange object found near Jupiter, mysticore, frogmen. All this and more on this episode of Bizarre States!

Subscribe to Nerdist on Twitch to catch Bizarre States live every Wednesday at 4!

episodes.title: Pregnant Bowser?
episodes.description:
Bowser and Jess talk some Weird of The Week, Skype with author Rob Gutro and Bowser has some EPIC Backyard News!

Catch Bizarre States Live every Wednesday at 4 on Twitch!

episodes.title: THE BINDING
episodes.description:
In this special bonus episode, Bowser sits down with Gus Krieger, the writer/director of The Binding and its two stars Amy Gumenick and Josh Heisler!

You can buy The Binding on BluRay now!

episodes.title: Haunted AF
episodes.description: Bizarre States' first live stream on Twitch! Jess and Bowser went live to talk about Michigan's Pompeii, the Belair mansion and some listener stories!

episodes.title: Island of Death
episodes.description: Bowser is sick this week so Jess flys solo to tell us some Weird of The Week, listener stories and Aristotle briefly talks about his trip to LACMA's Guillermo Del Toro Exhibit.

episodes.title: Live from SDCC with Nick Groff
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are joined by Nick Groff on this special live episode from SDCC16!

episodes.title: The Matrix Rave
episodes.description: This week Jessica and Bowser talk about smoking human brain, the NASA live stream and listener mail!

episodes.title: Gloomy Sunday
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are back this week to talk about a massive telescope in China, Pokemon Go, Gloomy Sunday and listener mail!

episodes.title: A Load of Chaz
episodes.description: This week Bowser and Jess are joined by Nerdist coworker Jason Nguyen to tell us a strange tale about his friend Chaz!

episodes.title: Browser The Cat & The Translucent Frogs!
episodes.description: Jess is solo this week (kind of, Aristotle is there!) to talk about translucent frogs, Browser the cat, Roanoke colonist and lots of listener mail!

episodes.title: The Enfield Poltergeist!
episodes.description: Jess is back from E3! She and Bowser talk about The Conjuring 2 and the true story behind it! They also have Backyard News, Weird of The Week and listener stories!

episodes.title: Stephanie Ritter
episodes.description: Bowser is solo this week with an update on the haunted mirror from last week, some backyard news and is then joined by Stephanie Ritter to tell us about her time with Paul...

episodes.title: Nautical Emissions with Brian Foster
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by Brian Foster from Legendary to talk about growing up with the paranormal, his documentary and weird of the week!

episodes.title: Bowser's Godincidence
episodes.description: Jessica (The She-Wolf of Nerdist) and Bowser (Sir Rudolph Tinklebottoms the 4th) are back this week to talk about the Secret Lives of Human Pups, a spooky photo taken at Queen Isabella's castle and Jessica's trip to San Luis Obispo and the pyramid mausoleum!

episodes.title: Ben Simms Haunted House
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are joined by Ben Simms to hear about his paranormal experience in his college home! Also, Weird of The Week, listener stories and Bowser's search for Hentai!

episodes.title: Kitty Biscuits and Blood
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess are back this week to talk about Old Stinker, an update on the grave in the middle of the road, Christopher Columbus and listener stories!

episodes.title: The Lost Mayan City!
episodes.description: Jessica and Bowser are back to talk about Guillermo Del Toro's upcoming exhibit, the 15 year-old that found a lost mayan city and listener mail!

episodes.title: Freddy v. Onyx!
episodes.description: Bowser and Jessica are back to talk about the grave that could'nt be moved, Onyx's interaction with Robert Englund and listener mail!

episodes.title: Todd Stashwick
episodes.description: Todd Stashwick (12 Monkeys) joins Jessica and Bowser on their second live stream to talk about the Pope Lick monster, ancient aliens and more!

episodes.title: Kristian Bruun
episodes.description: This week is another one of those special treats, a Bowser solo! Except this time he is joined by Kristian Bruun (Orphan Black) to talk about his paranormal experience and movies!

episodes.title: Haunted Hawaii & The Tale of E.T. Wickham
episodes.description: Bowser and Jessica by fellow Nerdist employee, Johnny Wickham, to talk about his grandfather's statues and Bowser talks about his time in Hawaii!

episodes.title: Dark Pinterest
episodes.description: Jessica talks about her deep dive into Dark Pinterest, Bowser tells the story of the 9 year-old reporter and listener stories!

episodes.title: Haunted Real Estate
episodes.description: Bowser and Jessica talk aout the recent listing of the Silver Lake Murder House, Hilary Clinton opening the UFO files and listener mail!

episodes.title: Welcome to Hell
episodes.description: This week, Chobot and Bowser talk a good amount about their privates, Welcome to Hell blog and listener mail.

episodes.title: The Female Stranger!
episodes.description: This week Bowser and Jessica are back to talk about The Grave of The Female Stranger, a haunted Toys"R"Us and listener mail!

episodes.title: Our First Live Stream with Susan Slaughter!
episodes.description: This is the audio from our very first live stream with paranormal investigator, Susan Slaughter!

episodes.title: Nick Groff & Katrina Weidman
episodes.description: This week Jessica and Bowser are joined by Nick Groff and Katrina Weidman, hosts of Destination America’s new show Paranormal Lockdown!

episodes.title: Did Meriwether Lewis Commit Suicide?
episodes.description: Jessica and Bowser talk about Apollo 11 astronauts hearing music in space, the Kalamazoo killer and Meriwether Lewis' suicide!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Mike Shaw & Michael Leffler
episodes.description:
Bowser and Jessica couldn't find time this week for an episode because they're both sick! So they've decided to put out a classic!

Mike Shaw & Michael Leffler bring their Bigfoot Manifesto and troll the BFRO.

episodes.title: The Ed Edwards Conspiracy
episodes.description: This week Jess and Bowser discuss the theory behind Making A Murderer and the haunted house in Indiana!

episodes.title: NASA's Cover-up!
episodes.description: Jess is back! Bowser talks about a truely depressing documentary and then Jess delves into the NASA Challeneger cover-up!

episodes.title: Cat Funerals
episodes.description: Bowser is solo again this week! He goes through the history of cat funerals, goes on a rant about Sundance and reads listener stories!

episodes.title: The Age of Puck!
episodes.description: This week, Bowser goes solo! We’ve got an update on Bowser’s backyard news, ghost pizza, horror movie reviews and listener mail!

episodes.title: Jonny Loquasto Returns!
episodes.description: Jonny Loquasto is back with more EVPs and chats with Jessica and Bowser about ghost cats, Grimm Reaper sightings and haunted places in LA!

episodes.title: Making A Murderer!
episodes.description: Happy New Year! Jessica and Bowser are back for the first episode of 2016 where they talk about elevator accidents, Making A Murderer (SPOILERS), and backyard news!

episodes.title: The History of Christmas
episodes.description: In this holiday special, Chobot explains the history of Christmas!

episodes.title: Mysteries of Time & Space!
episodes.description: This week Bowser has some unfortunate backyard news but then gets into Kentucky Goblins, odd mishaps in time and of course, listener mail!

episodes.title: The Metal Library
episodes.description: Jess is back running solo this week! She talks ghost ships and the Metal Library!

episodes.title: Makayla Lynn
episodes.description:
Bowser is back in solo mode so he's invited Makayla Lynn to talk about her experience in the paranormal!

If you don't want to hear Bowser's Back Yard News, skip to 10:43.

episodes.title: Black Knight Satellite
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser are finally back together to talk backyard news, true crime and the Black Knight Satellite!

episodes.title: Gunter Hotel Horror!
episodes.description: Jessica goes solo this episode to talk about that "rocket" over LA, Fallout 4 and the haunted Gunter Hotel!

episodes.title: Bowser's Horror Solo
episodes.description: Bowser is solo this week so it's CATS CATS CATS! Just kidding. Bowser compares 2 recent horror reboots Curse of Chucky and Ash VS Evil Dead in this spooky horror-movie themed edition of Bizarre States!

episodes.title: Daniel Montgomery
episodes.description: Bowser sits down with Danny Montgomery, host of Welcome to Deadcast, to talk about their Poltergeist experience, Goosebumps, and Creep LA!

episodes.title: O.P.P.
episodes.description: Bizarre States Presents: Other People's Paranormal! Listener stories read in a spooky new way!

episodes.title: More Listener Stories!
episodes.description: This week, Jessica is back with MORE of your stories! Aliens! Dolls! Ghosts!

episodes.title: Listener Stories!!
episodes.description: Bowser talks about his Poltergeist experience and Chobot reads listener mail!

episodes.title: Jack The Ripper!
episodes.description: This week, Jess runs down her Jack The Ripper experience and Bowser talk House Mother!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Ashley Troub
episodes.description: This is the second episode in the Bizarre States Classic series where we will be revisting great episodes from the past!

episodes.title: Magic Statues
episodes.description: This week Jessica and Bowser talk about the discovery of a human ancestor, a magic statue boner and listener mail!

episodes.title: Mark Alan Miller
episodes.description: This week, Jessica is joined by Mark Alan Miller (Seraphim Films) to talk about the Stanley Hotel, Dismaland and Clive Barker art coming to life!

episodes.title: Bowser SOLO
episodes.description: This week, Bowser is running solo and has some backyard news! Also, can you marry the dead? And how can I turn my pet into a werewolf? All on this weeks episode!

episodes.title: Annamarie Tendler Mulaney
episodes.description: Two great tastes that taste great together? Make-up and Hauntings. Annamarie Tendler Mulaney talks about her new Smart Girls show The Other Side.

episodes.title: Mike Shaw & Michael Leffler
episodes.description: Mike Shaw & Michael Leffler bring their Bigfoot Manifesto and troll the BFRO.

episodes.title: Chris Sanders
episodes.description: Bizarre States sits down with Chris Sanders from My Ghost Story and talks “Creepy Sleep”

episodes.title: Trains and Tuna
episodes.description: Tuna and Trains. Need we say more?

episodes.title: Berenstein or Berenstain?
episodes.description: How were The Berenstain Bears key figures in a parallel universe switch-a-roo? Find out in todays episode!

episodes.title: Back from SDCC
episodes.description: Chobot stumbles into some "non-practical" magic and Bowser bursts our cryptozoological bubble on Weird of the Week.

episodes.title: Live from SDCC with Ashley Troub, Jovenshire and Jonny Loquasto
episodes.description: Bizarre States First Ever Panel at San Diego Comic Con 2015! Ashley Troub, Jovenshire and Jonny Loquasto join us on stage at the Horton Grand Theater!

episodes.title: Bizarre States Classic: Joshua Ovenshire
episodes.description: This is the first in the Bizarre States Classic series where we will be revisting great episodes from the past!

episodes.title: Listener Stories!
episodes.description: You asked and we answered! 100% LISTENER STORIES on this episode of Bizarre States!

episodes.title: Possum Stories
episodes.description: Are the Freemasons tied to Skyrim, the video game? Find out on today's Bizarre States!

episodes.title: Ashley Troub
episodes.description: Chobot and Bowser are joined by Ghost Hunter extraordinaire Ashley Troub! They discuss Class A EVPs and home hauntings! Get ready for some Spoooooky Sh*t!

episodes.title: Sex and Nightmares
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess derail the podcast with sex talk and then re-rail with a breakdown of the documentary, The Nightmare.

episodes.title: Jeremy Kenyon Lockyer Corbell
episodes.description: Ufologist, artist and filmmaker Jeremy Kenyon Lockyer Corbell shares his philosophy on what's out there.

episodes.title: The Charlie Charlie Challenge!
episodes.description: Jess is back and boring us with her talk about occult book, The Oera Linda. Bowser & Jess try out the Charlie Charlie Challenge!

episodes.title: Haunted Massachusetts with Michelle Buchman
episodes.description: Lobotomies! Hauntings! Witches! Oh my! Bowser sits down with Nerdist's own Head of Social Media, Michelle Buchman, to discuss her hometown - which also happens to be the MOST HAUNTED CITY IN AMERICA!!!

episodes.title: Mercy Killer
episodes.description: Mercy killing or just murder? Bowser and Jessica chat about the British Columbia Facebook killing.

episodes.title: Aleister Crowley - "The Wickedest Man in The World"
episodes.description: Justin Benson & Aaron Moorhead join us to talk about the subject of their next film: famed occultist, Aleister Crowley.

episodes.title: Joshua Ovenshire
episodes.description: Smosh Games' Joshua Ovenshire joins us to talk about his time as a real life paranormal investigator!

episodes.title: Jonny Loquasto Returns!
episodes.description: Jonny Loquasto is BACK to talk Haunted Forests & Urban Legends!

episodes.title: Erika Lewis
episodes.description: Erika Lewis (author of The 49th Key) talks with Bizarre States about creepy mythology.

episodes.title: LIVE on Periscope!
episodes.description: Bizarre States's first ever #AMA w/ Jessica Chobot!

episodes.title: Tarot Card Reading with Jenna Busch!
episodes.description: Jenna Busch, Legion of Leia Founder, sheds light on the differences between High Magick, Wicca and Witchcraft! And one lucky Periscope viewer gets a Tarot reading!

episodes.title: Serial Killers
episodes.description: Serial Killers, HBO's The Jinx and An SKD Kickstarter? All that and more on this week's Bizarre States!

episodes.title: SKD & Urban Legends
episodes.description: Chobot & Bowser chat about the first successful penis transplant (because why wouldn't we), Bloody Mary and read listener mail!

episodes.title: Spooky Disney
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess talk Death at Disney and how you might like your remains to be treated!

episodes.title: Kate Leth & Jeremy Lambert
episodes.description: Bowser is joined by returning guests Kate Leth and Jeremy Lambert on this week's episode of Bizarre States! Together, they attempt to conjure a "fictitious ghost", read a listener story - AND write spooky stories of their own based on crowd-sourced titles! Enjoy...IF YOU DARE!!!

episodes.title: Brandon Winfrey
episodes.description: Insomniac Games' Brandon Winfrey joins us to talk about the Dyatlov Pass and some of our other favorite mysteries!

episodes.title: Reuben Langdon and Jonny Loquasto!
episodes.description: Reuben Langdon and Jonny Loquasto join us for a special Bizarre States: UFOs & Cosmic Consciousness.  No subject is left untouched!

episodes.title: Weird of the Week
episodes.description: Weird of the Week, Parallel Dimensions & The Austin Servant Girl Murders.

episodes.title: Listener Stories!
episodes.description: J. Chobes is rollin' solo in this episode of Bizarre States. THIS MEANS ALL THE LISTENER STORIES YOU CAN HANDLE!

episodes.title: Meltdown Overnight
episodes.description: It's here! The first-ever Video edition of Bizarre States. Chobot and Bowser hunker down in the haunted Meltdown Comics building for a night-vision cloaked overnight! Hear the history of the spooky comic shop, listener stories, and a special reading from everyone's favorite childhood nightmare-inducer SCARY STORIES TO TELL IN THE DARK. Will Chobot and Bowser make it out alive? Do they contact the other side through the use of a Ouija Board? Does Bowser learn the name of the unrestful spirit? Watch the episode and find out!

episodes.title: Jonny Loquasto Returns!
episodes.description: Jonny Loquasto is back with some mysterious EVP recordings from Gettysburg! Jess brings the listener stories and further spookiness abounds!

episodes.title: Happy Holidays Edition!
episodes.description: Happy Holidays Edition of Bizarre States! We've got a run-down on the current battle between two prominent Egyptologists & LISTENER STORIES! See you all in 2015!

episodes.title: Kate Leth and Jeremy Lambert
episodes.description: Edward Scissorhands writer Kate Leth and SyFy's HAVEN: ORIGINS writer Jeremy Lambert join Jessica and Bowser to chat hometown urban legends...and the thing at the foot of the bed! In this all-new Bizarre States.

episodes.title: Johnny Loquasto
episodes.description: This week's episode features REAL GETTYSBURG EVP recorded and shared by our guest - Jonny Loquasto!

episodes.title: Barbara Crampton
episodes.description: Bowser sits down with Scream Queen Barbara Crampton to hear her about her creepiest experiences on horror movie sets! Barbara also discusses what it was like growing up as the daughter of a traveling carnival worker - and divulges a personal experience involving Astral projection.

episodes.title: Stuart Gordon
episodes.description: Stuart Gordon of Re-Animator fame joins Bizarre States to talk horror movies and creepy dreams!

episodes.title: Listener Stories Vol. 2
episodes.description: Jessica and Bowser are back with more listener stories!

episodes.title: Clarke Wolfe
episodes.description: Bowser sits down with Clarke Wolfe (the Sleepycast podcast) and discusses all things horror, from their personal Halloween memories to their favorite movie slashers! Bowser also shares a spooky story from a visit he made to Eureka, CA!

episodes.title: The Evil Within with Dave Clayman
episodes.description:
Jess and Bowser sit down with guest Dave Clayman from Bethesda to talk The Evil Within and the Oklahoma Black Mass!

DOH! Bowser and I didn't realize this was going to go up after the Oklahoma Black Mass was to already occur. We will just have to keep those TMNT ideas percolating till next time! For Black Mass updates - head to our Bizarre StatesFacebook Page!

episodes.title: Jack the Ripper with Ptolemy Slocum
episodes.description: Special guest, Ptolemy Slocum, goes over the recent Jack the Ripper discovery with Bizarre States and shares some unnerving stories of the unknown.

episodes.title: Weird of the Week and Listener Stories
episodes.description: Bowser and Jess run down the Weird of the Week and read some listener stories!

episodes.title: Paris Catacombs and the Dowdle Brothers
episodes.description: Jess heads over to Paris to explore the underground catacombs and talk with the Dowdle brothers about their own paranormal experiences and their upcoming horror film, As Above So Below.

episodes.title: Murderers and Mysteries at the Cecil Hotel, Toynbee Tiles and Kymaerica
episodes.description: Jess and Bowser discuss the unexplained deaths occurring at LA's Cecil Hotel, the Toynbee Tiles mystery in NYC and Kymaerica, America's alternate universe sister-city.

episodes.title: Special Guest Reuben Langdon asks "Are Alien's Among Us?"
episodes.description: Special guest Reuben Langdon talks to us about the aliens that already walk amongst us.

episodes.title: Chobot's Real Life Haunting on the Queen Mary!
episodes.description: Join Jessica Chobot and Andrew Bowser as they lift the veil and showcase the hauntings, urban myths, unsolved murders and general oddities that everyone has experienced but no one wants to talk about.
